author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Indian Coast Guard on Saturday rescued eight people from a sinking dhow off Beypore on the Kerala coast in an early morning operation that came in for praise from Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

The Maritime Rescue and Coordination Centre in Mumbai dispatched a Coast Guard ship after it received an SOS around 2.10 a.m. on Saturday that the dhow was sinking and its eight crew members were in distress.

Timely and swift action by the Indian Coast Guard, tweets Prime Minister
title: 8 rescued from sinking dhow
